native_data.description: The native data to be used with Alipay SDK you must redirect your customer to in order to authenticate the payment in an Android App.

native_url.description: The native URL you must redirect your customer to in order to authenticate the payment in an iOS App.

return_url.description: If the customer does not exit their browser while authenticating, they will be redirected to this specified URL after completion.

url.description: The URL you must redirect your customer to in order to authenticate the payment.

expires_at.description: The timestamp after which the boleto expires.

hosted_voucher_url.description: The URL to the hosted boleto voucher page, which allows customers to view the boleto voucher.

pdf.description: The URL to the downloadable boleto voucher PDF.

expires_after.description: The timestamp after which the OXXO voucher expires.

hosted_voucher_url.description: The URL for the hosted OXXO voucher page, which allows customers to view and print an OXXO voucher.

return_url.description: If the customer does not exit their browser while authenticating, they will be redirected to this specified URL after completion.

url.description: The URL you must redirect your customer to in order to authenticate the payment.

type.description: Type of the next action to perform, one of `redirect_to_url`, `use_stripe_sdk`, `alipay_handle_redirect`, `oxxo_display_details`, or `verify_with_microdeposits`.

use_stripe_sdk.description: When confirming a PaymentIntent with Stripe.js, Stripe.js depends on the contents of this dictionary to invoke authentication flows. The shape of the contents is subject to change and is only intended to be used by Stripe.js.

arrival_date.description: The timestamp when the microdeposits are expected to land.

hosted_verification_url.description: The URL for the hosted verification page, which allows customers to verify their bank account.

data.description: The data being used to generate QR code

image_data_url.description: The base64 image data for a pre-generated QR code

image_url_png.description: The image_url_png string used to render QR code, can be used as

image_url_svg.description: The image_url_svg string used to render QR code, can be used as

app_id.description: app_id is the APP ID registered on WeChat open platform

partner_id.description: an unique merchant ID assigned by Wechat Pay

prepay_id.description: an unique trading ID assigned by Wechat Pay

timestamp.description: Specifies the current time in epoch format

native_url.description: An universal link that redirect to Wechat Pay APP
